description:
In this crafting tutorial you will see how I painted the Giant Scorpion miniature. If you haven't seen how I crafted the unpainted miniature, you should! https://youtu.be/EL9LT1_cn-o

Follow us on Facebook: https://tinyurl.com/y3n8m7s6
title: Crafting a Giant Scorpion (Part 2/2: Painting)  - D&D Miniatures Crafting Tutorial
